column2: I chose to celebrate my husband's birthday here. I made reservations and told the hostess it's a birthday dinner. We get there and they didn't have a table for us. Ok. So we waited... not long
column3: maybe 5 minutes. The hostess proceeds to seat us at a two-top table in a very open area of the restaurant. Normally I wouldn't care but I felt I made an effort to make reservation (a birthday one
column4: too) and the least they could do was reserve us a more private table. Major disappointment there. Good thing my husband is laid back and he didn't care. Another major disappointment
column5: the waitstaff never acknowledged the special occasion
column6: just treated us as if we were there for regular dinner.
